metadata.title: Bering Sea Shelf Models

creators.name: University of Alaska Fairbanks (UAF), School of Fisheries
Ocean Sciences (SFOS), Institute of Marine Science (IMS)

metadata.description:
2 and 3-D models to investigate trapped shelf waves of tidal origin in the eastern Bering Sea.
An NPMR project
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Model developed to support  "Investigation of Trapped Shelf Waves in the Bering Sea." NPMR project.

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: Unknown

Access constraints: Requires Contributor's permission
